hypothesis_content.title: BTC Volatility Compression Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC's 10-day Bollinger Band width (BBW) compresses below the 20th percentile of its 90-day range AND price breaks above the 20-day high with volume exceeding 1.5x the 20-day average, the subsequent 5-day return will exceed +3% more than 60% of the time in NEUTRAL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression in neutral regimes often precedes directional moves. The combination of BBW compression (measuring squeeze) with volume-confirmed breakout above recent resistance filters false breakouts. Current neutral regime with recent market fear creates ideal conditions for this setup.
entry_conditions: BTC 10-day BBW < 20th percentile of 90-day BBW range

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5-day holding period OR +5% return (whichever comes first)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate < 55% OR average win/loss ratio < 1.2 over 100+ historical instances in NEUTRAL regimes only.
